title: Teaser — Northstar / Riverbend — LOI — 2025-05-10
all_text:
CONFIDENTIAL TEASER — Riverbend Sensorworks Ltd. (SENSOR PLATFORM)

Overview:
- Business: wireless sensor hardware + embedded firmware
- Headquarters: Seattle, WA
- Primary offering: wireless industrial sensors with embedded firmware and cloud connectors
- Customers: industrial operators across utilities, logistics, and light manufacturing

Investment highlights:
- Cost synergies are primarily in duplicated back-office functions; revenue synergies depend
on channel expansion into utilities and mining.
- Gross margin improvement opportunity through component re-sourcing and pricing discipline.
- Sticky deployments: high switching costs due to sensor calibration + integration.

Key metrics (unaudited):
- FY revenue: $18M
- ARR (software/maintenance): $10M
- Hardware gross margin: 36%
- Top-5 customers: 59% of revenue

Process:
- NDA required for data room access
- Management presentation in 2–3 weeks
- IOIs due by May 31, 2025
